With the goal of making their agricultural activities profitable, two years ago the group member decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program.

Fatoumata plans to use her loan to purchase one bag of urea [fertilizers], two bags of complex cereals, and to sue the rest to cover costs of manual labor and weeding. The agricultural inputs will be bought   at the big market of Sikasso. After the winter season, the harvested produce is stored until its value increases and it is then sol at the same market retail (often wholesale) to a diverse clientele.

Fatoumata plans to achieve a monthly income between 35,000 and 45,000 West African francs, which will be used to repay interest on her loan and cover  everyday family expenses.

loans.use: to  pay for agricultural inputs and the cost of manual labor

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan, 36, is married with four children. He has had his own agriculture business since 2009, specializing in plowing fields, transporting water and in construction materials. Hasan works hard to provide his children and wife with living necessities, working in several areas to make sure he can cover their needs.

Hasan has been an Al Majmoua borrower for two cycles and is in good standing. His previous loan had a good impact on his business and his family's situation. This time, Hasan is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua to buy tools needed for his tractor, such as a machine that can be fixed on the tractor and spread antibacterial medicines over planted areas.

Hasan works hard on improving his transportation business to stay loyal to his clients and fulfill their needs. He hopes to buy all the agricultural machines that will help to expand his work.

loans.use: to buy tools needed for his tractor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy farm supplies and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds).

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and seeds.

loans.name: Adiza

texts.fr: Revendeuse de céréales depuis 1998, Mme Adiza est mère de 02 enfants  et son conjoint est gendarme. Elle achète ses céréales à Anié et revend à Agoé Assiyéyé. Ce troisième prêt lui servira à acheter des céréales pour revendre  à toute personne et assurer un avenir à ses enfants.
texts.en: A retailer of cereals since 1998, Madam Adiza is the mother of two children and the wife of a policeman.  She buys her grains in Anié and resells them in Agoé Assiyéyé.  This third loan will allow her to purchase cereals for resale and to ensure a future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cereals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay labor costs and to purchase agricultural inputs and seeds.

loans.name: Kodzovi

texts.fr: Mr Kodzovi est marié à une couturière et ils ont 02 enfants en charge. Il était menuisier de profession vu que son activité ne prospère pas comme il le souhaite, il a démarré en 2008 par diffuser des films et matchs dans un claie aménagé pour la circonstance à toutes personnes qui n’ont pas la possibilité d’avoir un abonnement à la maison.
texts.en: Mr Kodzovi is married to a seamstress and they have two children. He was a carpenter but as his commerce was not prospering as well as he wished, in 2008 he started a business showing films and sports in a shelter fitted out for the occasion for people who are not able to have a subscription at home.

loans.use: Purchase televisions and tables for fitting out the hall of the mini cinema.

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr:
Marie est une femme âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée à un mécanicien. Ils ont 5 enfants. 
Marie a travaillé comme revendeuse depuis 2000. Elle vend des ignames frites (un tubercule sucré très apprécié au Togo) pour  toutes personnes à la devanture de la maison après avoir acheté au marché d’Agoé.  
Marie a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter d’igname, d’huile, spaghetti et divers pour la restauration. Elle veut satisfaire la demande croissante, assurer un avenir meilleur à ses enfants et participer à la charge de la famille.
texts.en:
Marie is a 46 year old woman. She is married to a mechanic and they have 5 children.
Marie has been working as a retailer since 2000.She sells fried yams (a sweet tuber much appreciated in Togo) to anyone in front of her home having purchased them at the market in Agoé.
Marie has requested her third loan from Wages in order to purchase yams, oil, spaghetti and various products for catering. She wants to satisfy the growing demand, provide a better future for her children, and contribute to the family expenses.

loans.use: Purchase yams

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan, 39, is married and the father of six children. He has been working in construction for 20 years. He's an expert in his field and is recommended by most of his clients. Well known in the region, his work is special and updated with every new technology he learns of.

Hasan is requesting his first loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy wood pillars needed for his business. His family recommended Al Majmoua to him and he hopes that this step will have a positive impact on his business and social situation. His long experience gives him a special place in the construction field and helps in providing a good education for his children.

loans.use: to buy wood pillars needed for his business.

loans.name: Oumran

texts.en:
Oumran, 25, is a single man who has been working in tile polishing for eight years. He also transports water, in addition to driving agricultural transport.

Oumran has been an Al Majmoua-Kiva partner for three cycles. He is in good standing as a borrower, a hard worker and a man with a good reputation. In order to keep up his work, Oumran has requested a loan from Al Majmoua to buy the necessary tools and hardware for his tile polishing machine. This hardware will help improve his quality of work in a short period of time. Oumran is also seeking to finish pasting tiles and installing aluminum windows in his own house, which he is currently building to be his home. He needs to expand his business tools in order to cover more project requests.

loans.use: to buy the necessary tools and hardware for his tile polishing machine.

loans.name: Basoka Kwavula Development Group

texts.en:
Jackson is a 40-year-old ambitious businessman who relies on a food-sales business to provide for his family of 6. Jackson is happily married and he says his wife invariably helps him out at the food-market stall in Kayunga where he sells food. He has 3 years experience in running this business, where he principally sells bananas. 

Bananas are a staple food in most parts of Uganda and a seller cannot go wrong with sufficient reserves. In Jackson's case, farming has helped a lot. The fact that he is able to harvest bananas from his own gardens to sell has been pivotal. Jackson also sells cattle. He says his weekly sales profits are about 180,000 Ugandan shillings. With this Kiva loan, he says he is going to purchase high-grade manure for his banana farm.

loans.use: To purchase high-grade manure for his banana farm

loans.name: Ziyad

texts.en:
Ziyad is a 36-year-old married man and the father of one child.  He has worked as a butcher for 17 years. He's a man with a good reputation who works hard to improve his service to his customers and to meet their needs.

Ziyad is well known in the region because, compared to others, his shop is clean, his prices are affordable and his meat is tasty, as his clients say. He is  requesting a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua for his sixth loan, in order to buy sheep, raise them and then sell their meat. He likes to do this  because, as he says, he takes good care of the sheep to give him the tastiest meat to serve.

He's a borrower in good standing with Al Majmoua, and hopes to remain with the program. He hopes to expand his business and cover all of his family's expenses.

loans.use: To buy sheep to raise and then sell their meat

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 30 years old and married. He started a business three years ago selling various goods such as clothes, biscuits, sugar, lotion, soap, etc. Joseph works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day.

Joseph has requested his first loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy the above-mentioned goods to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and to buy a motorcycle to help him.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as clothes, biscuits, sugar, lotion, soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Kalagala Prosperity For All Group

texts.en:
Edisa, who is 43 years old, has been overseeing her fresh fruit and vegetable sales enterprise for the last decade in Kayunga.  Edisa is happily married with 4 children. She is one determined and tenacious lady, bent on seeing her business succeed against all odds in her maiden business undertaking.

Edisa sells mostly fresh fruit and vegetables from her farming garden.  She says this business generates her weekly sales profits of about 37,000  shillings. With this loan, she says she is going to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 36 years old and married with five children. He has 3 years experience in his business selling various products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. His business is well-organized and is open from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. during the week. He currently employs 3 people to help him.

Charles has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: To purchase more products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. to sell

loans.name: C 7967 Abatarutinya Group

texts.en:
Charlotte is 30 years old and married, with five children aged between 4 and 11 years old. She sells rice from her field and her business is well known and well organized. Business hours are from 7 a.m. until 1 p.m. on weekdays. Charlotte is the leader of this group called "ABATARUTINYA". She is the second person on the right in the first row, wearing a white t-shirt.  

Charlotte has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to increase her business by purchasing more rice to cultivate. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business, to save for the future and to pay her children`s school fees.

loans.use: To expand her business by purchasing more rice to cultivate.

loans.name: Odzi Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe!  This is 55 year old Gloria (holding the yellow file) from Masvingo.  She is widowed with four children with one attending school.  

Gloria runs a retail business selling clothing as well as poultry.  The business has been in operation for 10 years and employs one person.  She says the main challenges are the defaulting of debtors.  Gloria has requested a loan of $400 to increase stock.  She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve the general welfare of her family.  In the future Gloria plans to operate an outlet as she has been eyeing this for some time now.

loans.use: to increase stock

loans.name: C 7910 Abajyamugambi Group

texts.en:
Merciane is 43 years old and married, with five children aged between 6 and 16 years old. She is the representative of a group called "ABAJYAMUGAMBI " in the local language. In the photo, Merciane is the first person on the right. 

Merciane has operated a business cultivating rice for 2 years. Her business is well organized and its hours of operation are from 7 a.m. until 2 p.m. on weekdays.

Merciane has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more rice to cultivate. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To purchase more rice to cultivate in her field.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 29-year-old single man from Lebanon. He lives with his parents and two siblings. He has been working as a freelance electrician for more than 10 years, sticking with multiple electric projects. He also works as a plumber serving customers upon their request.  

In Lebanon, it is common at all levels of society for people to have multiple businesses to be able to cover the increasing costs of food, housing, and other family expenses. Today, this borrower is requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase an air compressor and new tools needed. He feels positive about his business future and looks forward to working on bigger projects.

loans.use: to purchase an air compressor and new tools needed.

loans.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is 38 years old and married. He has two years experience in his business selling various goods such as lotion, soap, biscuits, candles, etc. His business is well-organized and he currently employs one person to help him. The hours of his business are from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day of the week.

Felicien has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more of the above mentioned goods to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and save for his future.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as lotion, soap, biscuits, candles, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mukuvisi Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe!  This is 43 year old Febi (holding the yellow file) from Masvingo.  She is widowed with three children, one attending school. She also cares for four dependents. 

Febi runs a retail business selling clothes and firewood at a fixed location and from door to door.  The business has been in operation for 9 years.  She says the main challenges she faces are competition from other suppliers.  Febi has requested a loan of $400 to purchase more clothes and firewood. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to send her children to school and equip them with the right food and clothing.  In the future Febi plans to operate a shop employing workers.

loans.use: to purchase stock of firewood and clothes

loans.name: Ntenjeru Tubeere Group

texts.en:
Zebhor is a cheerful father of 4 who says hard work has taken his food sales business out of its stagnation.  In his farms in Kayunga from where he gets most of the crops he sells, he plants crops such as bananas, coffee, beans, maize and coffee.  He says it is mostly coffee he sells because it is a high selling crop in the food markets in and around Kayunga and in better food markets in Kampala.

From his own account he has done great business selling coffee.  It is on that basis that he wants to grow more coffee as the potential for even greater profits in the future.  His experience in this business for the last 5 years shows that nothing short of diligence, determination and optimism will bring business success.  Zebhor has been making common cause with Pearl Micro-finance for quite a long time.  He says it's where he prefers to apply and get loans from. 

Weekly he says this business generates him 150,000 Shillings as sales profits.  He reckons he will be able to earn an even greater amount when he gets this Kiva loan.  He anticipates this loan will be one of his means to achieve this end.  He is planning on purchasing more coffee seedlings to plant and dry coffee to sell

loans.use: The purchase pf coffee seedlings and dry coffee to sell

loans.name: Orit

texts.en:
Orit is a 41-year-old mother who lives in Hod Hasharon. She and her family moved to Israel at the end of 2010. Orit has an extensive background and training in yoga instruction and decided to open a private studio for both individual and group lessons. For the last several months she has been building up a clientele base. While Orit has the experience, charisma, charm and potential to manage a successful and much sought after studio, she was lacking basic materials for the studio and its marketing.

Orit needed this loan to purchase yoga mats & accessories, furniture for her studio, and for the creation & design of her business website.

Orit wants to see her business develop and become a successful enterprise. In the future she hopes the studio will expand and she can hire other instructors to provide lessons throughout the day for both groups and individuals.

loans.use: to purchase yoga mats & accessories, furniture for her studio, and for the creation & design of her business website.

loans.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en:
Marie Chantal is 33 years old and married, with five children aged between 3 and 11 years old.  She has 8 years experience selling men's shoes. Her business is well-organized and she works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except Saturday. Marie Chantal currently employs two people to help her.

Marie Chantal has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more men's shoes to sell. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business and to save for her future.

loans.use: To purchase more men's shoes  to sell.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: La señora Guillermina es empleada en una joyería  en la zona central y su esposo trabaja en el sindicato Simón Bolívar como chofer. El crédito lo requiere para el cambio de caja y la reparación general de su movilidad, esto para la seguridad de sus pasajeros.  Guillermina vive en casa propia, en la zona de Alpacota de la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene un hijo. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Guillermina works in a jeweler’s shop in the city center, and her husband works as a driver with the “Simón Bólivar” union. The loan she is requesting will be used to change the gear box and to pay for general repairs of his vehicle, in order to grant security to his passengers. Guillermina lives in her own house in Alpacota, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. She is married and she has a son. This is the first loan she has requested to IMPRO and KIVA..

loans.use: To change teh gear box and to pay for general repairs on her husband's public transportation vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy an engine for his taxi.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: El señor Carlos trabaja como chofer  con el taxi de su propiedad; el crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de tramites de transferencia del vehiculo. Vive en casa propia, la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz; es divorciado,  tiene tres hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Carlos is a cab driver and he drives his own taxi. The loan he is requesting will be used to repay the transfer expenses of the vehicle. He lives in his own house in Achachicala, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. He is divorced and has three children. This is the first time he is requesting a loan through IMPRO.

loans.use: To repay the transfer expenses of the taxi.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es: El señor Simón es empleado, trabaja en una empresa al igual que su esposa. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un auto que le ayudaran mucho para desplazarse a su fuente de trabajo sin problemas ya que viven en un lugar muy alejado. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz; Simon es casado y tiene dos hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente y tiene un excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en: Simón is an office worker; he and his wife work for the same company. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a car, which will help them easily reach his place of work as they live quite far away from it. He lives in his parents’ house in Achachicala, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. Simón is married and has two children. This borrower is very satisfied with the loan he has previously been granted, and his repayment history is excellent.

loans.use: To buy a vehicle to reach is place of work.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: La señora Verónica es empleada de una oficina desempeñando las funciones de secretaria. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de los trámites de la carrera que estudia. Vive en casa de su esposo, ubicada en la zona de Alto Pura Pura de la ciudad de La Paz;  es casada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Verónica works as a secretary in an office. She needs a loan for administrative fees and expenses at her university. Verónica is married and has two children; she lives with her husband in the Alto Pura Pura zone of La Paz city. This is her first loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: To pay administrative fees required to obtain her university degree.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La señora Emiliana se dedica a la venta de comida como ser: almuerzos y platos extras. El crédito lo requiere para compra de insumos (papa, arroz, carne, condimentos, etc.) así aumentara su capital de trabajo. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz;  es casada y tiene dos hijos. La cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron pudo ampliar su negocio lo que implica el aumento de clientela. Esta es la quinta vez que solicita un crédito de Impro y la segunda con Kiva.
texts.en: Señora Emiliana's occupation is selling food, such as lunches and other dishes. The loan is required to purchase ingredients (potato, rice, meat, condiments, etc.) and to increase her working capital. She lives in her own house in the Alto San Pedro area of La Paz city, is married and has two children. The client is very satisfied with the loans granted to her, enabling her to expand her business which involves increasing the number of customers. This is the fifth time she is applying for credit with Impro and the second with Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice, meat, potatoes, noodles, etc., for her business preparing and selling food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies for crops and buy more fruit merchandise.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is a hard-working mother who is now 56 years old.  She has a grocery store where she sells noodles, junk foods, detergent soaps and canned goods.  Milagros has operated this business for almost seven years. 

Milagros is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase additional grocery items, soft drinks, frozen foods and vegetables.  She usually earns about PHP 8,000 each month in this business.

In the future, Milagros hopes to improve this kind of business in order to supplement her husband's income for the sake of their children and their future. She hopes that KIVA lenders will continuously support her in the business in order to achieve her goals in life.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items, soft drinks, frozen foods and vegetables

location.town: Brgy. Malasin, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Arle Javier

texts.es: Arle de 28 años de edad,  trabaja como asesor pedagogico del Ministerio de Educaciòn del el Almendro, es  habitante de la  zona #  1 de Nueva Guinea  solicicita su 9no crèdito para comprar materiales de construcciòn  para construir su propia vivienda, se siente agradecido con nuestra instituciòn ya que atraves de un crèdito otorgado por AFODENIC tiene su propio solar y poco a poco ir construyendo su propia vivienda, su esposa tambien se desempeña como docente ambos se ayudan con todos los gastos , su mayor sueño en la vida es tener su propia vivienda y que su familia goze de salud.
texts.en:
Arle is 28 years old and works as a teaching assessor for the Ministry of Education in El Almendro. He resides in Zone #1 of Nueva Galicia.

Arle is requesting his 9th loan to buy construction materials to continue building his own house. He is very grateful to our institution since due to previous loans through AFODENIC, he has acquired  his own lot and little by little, is constructing his own house.

Arle's wife is also a teacher. Both contribute to covering household expenses. His greatest dream in life is to have his own home and that his family enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy materials for home construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise, mainly fruit, to sell.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es: Doña Eusebia de 49 años de edad trabaja como docente desde hace 20 años, solicita su 2do crèdito para construir el baño de su vivienda y asi gozar de mejores condiciones junto a su humilde familia  , su compañero de vida la ayuda con el pago de las cuotas ya que son bien unidos , su mayor sueño en la vida gozar de mucha salud para seguir trabajando y ayudar a su linda familia y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida
texts.en: Eusebia, 49, has been working as a Teacher for 20 years.  She is asking for her second loan to build a bathroom in her house to enjoy better living conditions with her humble family.  Her life partner helps her pay her loan installments because they are very united.  Her greatest dream in life is to enjoy good health, to help her lovely family and gradually be improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy meal preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables and all kinds of meat.

loans.name: Yayanmarca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “YAYANMARCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Paulina; ella es conviviente y tiene 48 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia vende los animales menores en las distintas ferias que existe en el distrito de Urcos, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de crianza y venta de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales como cuyes y gallinas y también comprar alimentos para los animales.


Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de productos secos, compra y venta de ovejas, negocio de venta de telares, negocio de venta de comida y venta de verduras.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “Yayanmarca” communal bank which is located in Urcos District belonging to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

Paulina, 48, is the member.  She has a spouse and five children.  She works raising small farm animals, like guinea pigs and chickens, that she sells in the various farmers markets that exist in Urcos District.  She works from 7am until 5pm and she raises her children through this business.  She wants to expand the animal raising business and is asking for a loan to buy animals, like guinea pigs and chickens, as well as animal feed for them.

The other group members sell dry goods, are sheep merchants, textile merchants, food sellers and vegetable merchants.

The member thanks all those who are sharing her dream through this means and commits to repay her loan in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy animals like guinea pigs and chickens as well as animal feed.

loans.name: Reli Group

texts.en:
Khatibu, in his early 30's, is a married father of two children, one of whom goes to school. The operator of a tailoring business for five years now, he works from 6.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Khatibu's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, his previous loans, all repaid, having been used to buy a sewing machine, renovate his shop and meet household expenses. He will use this loan to buy materials for the sewing business, and his dream is to one day expand his shop and employ people to sew.

Khatibu will share this loan with his loan group "Reli," which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy materials for his sewing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more merchandise like DVDs and CDs, for example.

loans.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger, a married man living in San Jose, Enrile, Cagayan is the father of six children. His spouse devotes herself full-time to taking care of their children.

Roger has been in the business of providing motorcycle transport services in the local community for five years, earning approximately PHP 4,000 monthly. He is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 from KIVA lenders through ASKI to purchase new tires and repair his current vehicle to ensure the safety of his passengers.

In the future, Roger would like to strengthen his business in order to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to purchase new tires and to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 55 años, esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos ya que tiene mucho tiempo de ser cliente de Fundación. Su actividad es la venta de carne, pues siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, todos los días llegan sus clientes a comprarles una gran variedad de carne. Lo que ella ofrece es lomo, pancho, hígado, posta y otros productos, es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de una gran variedad de carnes.
texts.en:
This isn’t the first loan Mercedes, 55, has requested; she’s been a client of the Fundación for a long time.  

Her activity is meat sales since she’s always seeking ways to improve her and her family’s quality of life.  Customers come by daily to buy a large variety of meat.  She stocks sirloin, brisket, liver, round steak and other meat products and this is why she’s asking for a loan to buy a large variety of meats.

loans.use: to buy meat and meat byproducts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for her bicycle business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Bakolle Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 19 octobre 2001. Il est composé de huit femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Amy qui est à la droite de la photo vêtue d'un boubou bleu est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de huit enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge trois autre enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de produits maraichères et de l'huile de palme. 

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on October 19, 2001. It is composed of eight women living in the same neighborhood. Their main business activity is retail.

Mrs. Amy, on the right in the photo, dressed in a blue outfit, is the group’s leader. She is 43 years old. She is married and the mother of eight. She also has three other children in her care, entrusted to her by relatives.

She sells garden produce and palm oil. This loan will allow her to bolster her working capital and better develop her business. Her income will allow her to improve the life conditions of her family (healthcare, food, clothing etc…) and to grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy garden produce and palm oil

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene, a responsible 41-year-old housewife, has been engaged in selling cosmetics and apparel from AVON, Natasha and MSE within her village for almost five years. She usually earns about PHP 5,000 each month. Mylene is now requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase additional lipsticks, perfumes, lotions and powders to sell.

In the future, Mylene hopes to strengthen this enterprise in order to help her husband in gaining income for their family. She hopes that Kiva lenders will support them in this business to make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to purchase additional lipsticks, perfumes, lotions and powders to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Malasin Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Bayerena Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 19 octobre 2001. Le groupe est  constitué de six femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Khady qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de six enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autre enfants confié par ses parents.

Elle fait un petit commerce de tomate et de bissab (feuilles oseille). 

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités afin de générer plus de bénéfice.

Son objectif est de participer à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was formed on October 19, 2001. The group is made up of six women who live in the same district. Their main business involves selling small items. 

Madame Khady who is on the right in the photo, raising her hand, is the leader of the group. She is 43, married, and the mother of six children. She is also raising two other children who were confided to her by relatives. 

She has a little business selling tomatoes and hibiscus petals. This loan will allow her to bolster her capital and expand her business so as to earn more income. Her goal is to participate in improving family living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and adding to her savings.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes and dried hibiscus flowers.

loans.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es: Augusto Cesar siempre ha sido una persona luchadora, pues siempre está disfrutando de proporcionar a su cliente los ingresos necesarios. Su negocio es la venta de ropa, desde hace más de 8 años que tiene este negocio, ha salido adelante por medio de duro trabajo y dedicación. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, vestidos y camisas para vestir. Es así  que podrá permitirle a sus clientes brindarles una gran variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Augusto Cesar has always been a tenacious person.  He always enjoys supplying his customers and getting the income he needs.

His business is selling clothes.  He has had this business for over eight years.  He has gotten ahead through his hard work and dedication.

The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.  That way he will be able to offer his customers a great variety of products.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for his crops.

loans.name: Dioko Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité DIOKO a été créé le 14 mai 2010.Il est composé de 13 membres qui sont issus de la même localité. Elles ont pour activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Mame Aminata à l’extrême droite est responsable du groupement,elle est mariée et s'occupe de 09 enfants qui ne sont pas les siens.

Sa principale activité est la vente de glaces;de jus de fruits.

Son prêt lui permettra d'acheter des chaussures et des bijoux qu'elle va revendre.

Son objectif est de renforcer sa capacité d'épargne,aussi la nourriture et la santé des enfants dont elle a la charge.
texts.en:
The solidarity group called DIOKO was formed on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 13 members who all come from the same locality. Their principal activity involves selling small items. 

Ms. Mame Aminata, on the far right, is the leader of the group. She is married and raising nine children, none of whom are her biological children. Her main business is selling ice-creams and fruit juice. Her loan will allow her to buy shoes and costume jewelry for resale. 

Her goal is to be able to save more, as well as supporting the children she is raising, providing for food and health concerns.

loans.use: to buy shoes and costume jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Saint Christophe Group

texts.fr:
ce groupement  a été créé le 14 mai 2010.il est composé de 23 membres issus de la même commune. Leur activité principale est le commerce de l’arachide.

La femme qui est en position debout avec le bras élevé est responsable du groupement, elle est âgée de 38 ans et n'a aucun enfant en charge.

Sa principale activité est la transformation de l'arachide en pâte.

Son prêt lui permettra d'acheter des arachides pour les transformer en pâte en vue de les revendre.

Son objectif est de disposer d'une bonne épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 23 members who all come from the same township. Their primary activity is buying and selling peanuts. 

The woman standing and raising her hand is the leader of the group. She is 38 and is not raising any children. Her main business is making peanuts into peanut butter. Her loan will allow her to buy peanuts to make into peanut butter and then sell. 

Her goal is to put aside a lot in savings.

loans.use: to buy peanuts to use to make peanut butter.

loans.name: Balcon Florido Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Balcón Florido” cuenta con 8 integrantes. Clinda es la Presidenta del grupo, se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. queso D. forma artesanal. La comunidad en donD. residen los integrantes D. esta Alcancía Comunal  es alejada y al menos 3 horas D. viaje en carretera sin pavimentación, por lo cual a lo mas 2 veces a la semana sacan sus productos a la provincia.  Clinda junto a sus socios se dedican a la ganadería desD. hace 20años. Su dedicación y esfuerzo le ha permitido adquirir un terreno y actualmente lo esta pagando con su trabajo. El dinero del préstamo será invertido en la compra  D. insumos como: sal, cuajo (pastillas para cuajar el queso) y moldes para la fabricación del queso,  además Clinda adquirirá Alimento balanceado para sus  vacas. Clinda esta entusiasmada pues por festividades en su pueblo le permitirá aumentar sus  ventas. La Alcancía Comunal “Balcón Florido”  es leal al programa y agradecen la nueva oportunidad D. financiar su trabajo
texts.en:
The communal bank "Balcón Florido" has 8 members. Clinda is the President of the group, she is engaged in the manufacture and sale of artisanal cheese. The community where the members of this communal bank live is remote and at least 3 hours trip by unpaved road to the province, so they take their products there at most twice a week. Clinda, together with her partners, has been engaged in raising cattle for 20 years.  Her dedication and hard work has allowed her to acquire some land and it is now paying off with her work. 

The loan money will be invested in the purchase of supplies such as salt, rennet (tablets for curdling cheese) and molds for the manufacture of cheese, additionally Clinda will acquire balanced feed for her cows. Clinda is excited because festivities in her village will allow her to increase her sales. The communal bank "Balcón Florido" is loyal to the program and welcome the new opportunity to finance their work.

loans.use: to buy salt, rennet tablets for making cheese, and balanced food for the cows

loans.name: Sope Serigne Babacar Sy Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement sope serigne babacar sy a été créé le 14 mai 2010.IL est composé de 18 membres issus de la meme commune.

Madame Aida debout à l’extrême droite de la photo est responsable du groupement.Elle est âgée de 41 ans ,elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants.

sa principale activité est le commerce de tissus  et de parfums.D'ailleurs elle dispose d'une bonne expérience 
de cette activité pour l'avoir pratiqué un peu plus d'un an.

Son prêt lui permettra d'acheter des tissus,du parfum et de la pâte qu'elle va revendre.

Son objectif est d'assurer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The group Sope Serigne Babacar Sy was created on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 18 members who all come from the same township. 

Madame Aida, standing on the far right in the photo, is the group leader. She is 41, married, and the mother of five children.  

Her main business is selling lengths of cloth and perfumes. In fact, she has good experience as she has been in this business for a little more than one year. Her loan will permit her to buy cloth, perfumes and peanut butter for resale. 

Her goal is to ensure that she can pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy cloth, perfume, and peanut butter.

loans.name: Xalafal Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement XALAFAL a été créé le 08 mai 2010.Il est composé de 22 femmes issues du meme village.Elles ont pour principale activé le petit commerce du sucre.

Madame Wanegué à droite, en position debout;le bras levé est responsable du groupement,elle est âgée de 59 ans,elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants et s'occupe également de 05 autres enfants dont elle a la garde.

Elle a pour activité le petit commerce du sucre et de l'huile;elle dispose d'une bonne expérience de cette activité pour l'avoir pratiquer pendant 02 ans.

Son prêt lui permettra d'acheter du bétail pour faire de l'élevage,et aussi acheter du sucre et de l'huile en vue de les revendre.

Son objectif est d'aider son mari en l'appuyant dans les charges du ménage: scolarité des enfants;la dépense quotidienne de la maison.
texts.en:
The Darou Fall group was created on May 8, 2010. It is composed of 22 women who come from the same village. Their main activity is buying and selling sugar. 

Madame Wanegué, on the right, standing with her hand raised, is the leader of the group. She is 59, married, and the mother of three children. She also cares for five other children for whom she is responsible.  

Her main activity is buying and selling sugar and oil. She has good experience since she has been in this business for two years. 

Her loan will allow her to buy livestock to raise, as well as buying sugar and oil for resale. Her goal is to help her husband cover family expenses such as the children's school fees and daily household expenditures.

loans.use: to buy livestock, oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Gorgorlu Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe GORGORLU a été créé le 17 Mai 2011 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois. Il compte 25 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles font toutes le petit commerce.

Madame Adama au milieu du groupe, levant la main, est responsable. Elle est âgée de 45 ans, est mariée et mère de cinq enfants. Elle a en charge  un neveu et deux belles filles.

Elle vend du thé qu’elle achète au marché hebdomadaire de sa localité. Activité qu’elle exerce de puis plus de cinq.

Son prêt va lui permettre de mieux s’approvisionner en thé.

Les bénéfices lui serviront d’augmenter son capital, et de soutenir son mari dans de la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
The group called Gorgorlu was created on May 17, 2011 at the time of the inauguration of their "Banc Villageois". It numbers 25 women who all live in the same village. They all buy and sell small items. 

Madame Adama, in the center of the group, raising her hand, is the leader. She is 45, married, and the mother of five children. She also supports one nephew and two daughters-in-law. She sells tea which she buys at the weekly market in her area. She has been in this business for more than five (years). 

Her loan will allow her to stock up on tea. The profit will allow her to increase her working capital and help her husband to pay school fees for their children.

loans.use: to stock up on tea.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for crops

loans.name: Jokker Endem Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Joker Endam a été créé le 17 Mai 2011 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois. Il compte 25 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles font toutes le petit commerce.


Madame Aminata (assise un peu à gauche du groupe et levant la main) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 20 ans, mariée et mère d’un enfant.


Elle vend de l’arachide en détail. Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus d’une année.


Son crédit va lui permettre d’acheter de l’arachide pour la revente.


Avec les bénéfices elle compte appuyer son mari dans les charges domestiques.
texts.en:
The Joker Endam group was created on May 17, 2011, at the same time as their "Banc villageois" was inaugurated. It comprises 25 women, who all live in the same village. They are all retailers.

Mrs. Aminata, who is sitting towards the left of the group with her hand raised, is the group's leader. She is 20 years old, married, and a mother of one.

She retails ground nuts. She has been in this business for over a year.

Her loan will allow her to purchase ground nuts to resell.

With the profit, she intends to assist her husband with domestic expenditures.

loans.use: to purchase ground nuts for resale.

loans.name: Las Hormiguitas Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Las Hormiguitas” ya tiene 2 años D. funcionamiento y está conformado por 9 personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad del Cusco. La mayoría D. los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco.   

En esta reunión conocimos a la señora Paulina que vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y tiene ocho hijos pero que todos ya son independientes. DesD. joven se caracterizo por ser una persona responsable, amable y trabajadora y por ese motivo sus vecinas le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal. Paulina se dedica a la venta D. mermeladas D. diferentes frutas naturales, ella misma los prepara en su domicilio y los envasa en recipientes D. buena calidad. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como  por ejemplo azúcar, miel, frutas frescas y otras cosas más. Ella tiene 73 años D. edad, es una persona con muchas ganas D. superarse y tener un negocio exitoso día con día, siempre con el deseo D. brindarle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Las Hormiguitas” ("The Ants") has been operating for 2 years and is comprised of 9 people.  They are workers and entrepreneurs who at every moment seek the opportunity to succeed and through their daily efforts to proviD. a better future for their children. The meetings of the communal bank take place every thirty days in the city of Cusco. Most members live in the city of Cusco.

At this meeting we met Señora Paulina who lives in the beautiful city of Cusco and has eight children, but all of them are independent. Since her youth, she has been known for being a responsible person, kind and hardworking, and that is why her neighbors invited her to participate in the communal bank. Paulina is dedicated to the sale of various natural fruit jams, she prepares them in her home and packages them in good quality containers. At this time she is requesting a loan to buy more ingredients such as sugar, honey, fresh fruit and other additional items. She is 73 years old, and is a person eager to excel and have a successful business every day, always with the desire to proviD. the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for making jam, for example sugar, honey and fresh fruit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Saranga Group

texts.en:
Dainess, a single woman in her mid 20's, is the mother of a very small child. She also takes care of her young sister who is still in school. Dainess has been running a beauty salon for two years now, and is able to make a good monthly profit working from 8.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. daily.

This will be Dainess's sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, her previous loans, all since repaid, having been used to pay for her sister's school fees and salon equipment. She now hopes for a loan to buy yet more salon equipment. Her dream is to one day become a designer.

She will share this loan with her group "Saranga," which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more salon equipment.

loans.name: "unidos Al Futuro" Group

texts.es:
“Unidos al futuro” es una Alcancía Comunal con 8 integrantes. Sabina es una mujer D. 53 años, casada, tiene 2 hijos mayores. Hace 5 años tiene una tienda en donD. venD. abarrotes y productos D. primera necesidad, su deseo junto a su esposo es que esta tienda mejore en su stock D. productos y así tener mayores ganancias para ayudar a sus hijos además construir y mejorar su vivienda. Sabina invertirá en la compra D. aceite, leche, arroz  y azúcar para ofrecer en su tienda. Sabina  junto a sus socios son personas con valores definidos y ser responsables les caracteriza.
La Alcancía Comunal “Unidos al futuro”  agradece la nueva oportunidad D. financiar sus actividades económicas y trabajo.
texts.en:
“Unidos al futuro” [United for the Future] is a communal bank which has 8 members.  Sabina is a 53 year old woman who is married and has 2 older children.  She has had a store where she sells groceries and basic necessity products for 5 years.  Her desire, along with her husband, is to improve their stock of products and thereby, increase their income to help their children as well as build and improve their home.  

Sabina will invest in the purchase of oil, milk, rice and sugar to sell in her store.  Sabina and her fellow members are responsible people with set values.  The communal bank "Unidos al futuro" is grateful for the new opportunity to finance their work and economic activities.

loans.use: buy oil, rice and sugar to stock her store.

loans.name: G.s. Montes De Los Olivos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Montes De Los Olivos. Sofía tiene su negocio que es la venta de frijoles, desde hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio, siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy responsable y disfruta de su actividad al proporcionar a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Inicio con la idea de ayuda r a su esposo en la manutención del hogar. Es por eso que realiza este crédito con el fin de invertir en la compra de 2 quintales de frijoles y proporcionarles a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan.
texts.en:
“Montes De Los Olivos” (Mount of Olives) communal bank.

Sofía’s business is selling beans.  She’s had it for over four years.  She’s always liked being a very responsible person and she enjoys being able to provide her family with needed income.  She started out with the idea of helping her husband support the household.  This is why she’s asking for this loan to buy two quintals of beans to have for customers who request them.

loans.use: to buy two quintals of beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Angela Cecilia

texts.es: Ángela Cecilia tiene 30 años, su actividad es la venta de productos lácteos. Desde hace mas de 2 años que tiene este negocio, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo de 10 y 8 años respectivamente de quienes se encarga diariamente para prepararlos. Inicio cuando tenía 6 vacas que había obtenido por su Mama quien se las había regalado, con mucho empeño y dedicación Ángela decide establecer su negocio de venta de productos lácteos en su vivienda al notar que era muy rentable decide comenzar esta actividad. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de vacas ya que actualmente no tiene.
texts.en:
Ángela Cecilia is 30 years old.  Her activity is selling dairy products.  She’s had this business for over two years.  She has two minor children in her care who are 10 and 8 years old respectively.  She takes care of getting them ready every day.

She started when she had six cows that she’d obtained from her mother who gave them to her.  With much effort and dedication Ángela decides to establish her business selling dairy products from home when she noticed that deciding to start this activity was very profitable.  The reason for the loan is to buy cows because she currently doesn’t have any.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Alamouta Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité est créé le 19 octobre 2001. Il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier. leur activité tourne au tour de la vente de l'huile de palme, de jus de citron, de petit déjeuner et de patte d'arachide.

Madame Aissatou debout la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée 52 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants. Elle a aussi en charge quatre autres enfants qui lui sont confiés par ses proches.

Elle s'active dans le commerce de poissons frais depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital afin de mieux développer son activité.

Les bénéfices lui permettront à aider son mari dans la prise en charge des frais de nourriture de la famille.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on October 19, 2001. It is composed of women who live in the same neighborhood. Their businesses involve selling palm oil, lemon juice, breakfasts, and peanut butter.  

Madame Aissatou, standing on the right in the photo and raising her hand, is the leader of the group. She is 52, married and the mother of five children. She is also raising four other children who were confided to her by those around her. 

She has been selling fresh fish for several years. This loan will allow her to increase her capital so that she can expand her business. The profit will permit her to help her husband pay for food for the family.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad de 36 años, está casado  y vive con sus 5 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la siembra del frijol y asistirlo en su etapa de crecimiento. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo en buenas condiciones. El quiere sembrar esa área y poder asistirlo bastante para obtener posteriormente buenos resultados y así poder salir adelante con los pagos del préstamo y mejorar el nivel de vida de mi esposa e hijos.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Francisco is 36 years old, married and living with his five children and his wife who are his main priority in life.  He intends to use the loan for his bean crop, to help it during the growing stage.  He has a field in good condition that is apt for growing this particular crop.  He wants to plant it and provide much care to obtain the best results later and be able to repay the loan and improve his wife’s and his children’s standard of living.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.  He hadn’t had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to tend to his bean crops.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa de 32 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta conserviciosólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad agricola, ganadera y artesanía.

Rosa se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, negocio que se encuentra en su domicilio, pero que también lo ofrece de casa en casa a sus vecinos desde hace varios años.  Estos productos es para que las personas mejoren su imagen perosnal, también labora en una ONG que es otroingresoque recibe para cubrir las  necesidades de su hogar.

Ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de productos y les pueda seguir ofertando a sus clientes y para inmobiliario para exibir sus productos. Con los ingresos de la venta de todos sus productos de belleza cubriría el préstamo brindado y mejorará su calidad de vida.  Rosa es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, alegre y responsable con laúnica idea de seguir superandose en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is 32 years old, single, and lives in her parents' home.  The only service the house receives is electricity.  It is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Rosa sells beauty products through a catalog.  Her business is located in her home but she has also been making sales door to door to her neighbors for several years.  She sells products which help people to improve their personal image.  Rosa also works for an NGO which is another source of income  she has for covering her household needs.

Rosa has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the money to buy a larger quantity of products that she will be able to continue offering to her customers.  She will also buy furniture for displaying her products.  With the income she makes from selling all her beauty products, Rosa will be able to repay her loan and improve her quality of life.  Rosa is very well known as a hard-working, cheerful and responsible woman whose only goal is to continue doing well in life.

loans.use: to buy furniture and more beauty products to stock her business

loans.name: Gloria Narcisa

texts.es:
Gloria Narcisa tiene 42 años, Es viuda vive sola, tiene tres hijos pero todos son casados, vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Medellín, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Gloria se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maíz desde hace 25 años además se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los días en especial  la de los domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos, también para la alimentación de los animales.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos es la competencia y la variación del clima. Su sueño es dejar buena herencia a los hijos.

Le gusta salir a pasear y hacer deporte con la familia.
texts.en:
Gloria Narcisa is 42 years old.  She’s a widow and lives alone.  She has three children but they are all married.  She lives in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The “La Unión” (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fría de Medellín which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.

Gloria has been farming corn for the last 25 years.  She also raises small farm animals.  Her purchases take place in Ventanas and her sales occur at daily farmers markets, especially Sunday’s.

She is asking for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure and also for animal feed.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are competition and weather variations.

Her dream is to leave a good inheritance for her children.  She enjoys going out on trips and playing sports with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure and also to feed the animals.

loans.name: Las Carmelitas Group

texts.es: La Señora Maritza es integrante del Grupo Comunal "Las carmelitas", La Sra.  Maritza tiene 45 años  y vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella empezo el negocio primero estudiando en una ONG al culminar sus estudios empezo a elaborar los dulces aprendidos en casa y los ofrecia a las vecinas. En la actualidad ella cuenta ya con sus clientes fijos a quienes les ofrece sobretodo los fines D. semana. Su meta es poder tener su propia pasteleria en donD. pueda ofrecer sus dulces. Su prestamo lo invertira en la compra D. insumos para la elaboracion D. sus pasteles.
texts.en: Mrs. Maritza lives in Nueva Jerusalén in Carabayllo.  She is 45 years old and lives with her husband and three children.  She started her business first by taking courses at an NGO.  When she finished her schooling she started making sweets that she’d learned how to make at home and she’d sell them to her neighbors.  She currently has a regular customer base that she sells to, especially on weekends.  Her goal is to have her own pastry shop where she can sell her sweets.  She will use the loan to buy cake making ingredients.

loans.use: to buy cake making ingredients.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad de 54 años, está casado  y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los fertilizantes para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con la propiedad y es adecuada para la buena explotación de este cultivo, además ya la tiene sembrada y lo que necesita es asistirla para así obtener mejores resultados. El quiere generar los recursos necesarios para seguir adelante con su proyecto y darle cada día a su familia un mejor bienestar económico.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Francisco is 54 years old.  He’s married and lives with his son and wife who are his greatest priority in life.  He intends to use the loan to buy fertilizer for his coffee plantation.  He has a piece of land that is well conditioned to grow this particular crop.  Besides, he already has it planted and what he needs is to help it along to obtain the best results.  He wants to generate the necessary resources to move forward with his project and provide his family every day with better economic wellbeing.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.   He hadn’t had previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy flower seeds and manure.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose F. es de Mollejones, y es conocido por ser una persona muy emprendedora y trabajadora.
El se dedica a la agricultura y desde poco ha tenido muchos problemas con su  vivienda, Ya que hubo un deslizamiento de tierra muy cerca de su casa. Es por eso que necesita pagar la mano de obra para votar  la gran cantidad de tierra que cayó en frente de si casa. Para eso necesitara un préstamo de ₡300 000  (Trescientos mil colones). El está muy agradecido ya que este tipo de instituciones siempre están Disponibles cuando uno lo necesita. 
El es socio de la empresa de Crédito Comunal Bancruce, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Jose F. is from Mollejones and is known as an enterprising and hard-working person.
He is a farmer and  lately has started having problems with his house since there was a landslide very nearby.  That is the reason he needs to pay for labor to move the large amount of mud that landed in front of his house.  He is requesting a loan of 300 thousand colones.  Juan F. is very grateful for this type of institution that is always ready to help when needed.
He is a member of the Bancruce communal bank, one of the 110 branches of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: To protect against landslides

loans.name: Gredin

texts.es: Gredin, tiene la edad de 33 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal y la mano de obra. El pretende con realizarle esta mejora su cafetal produzca mayores cantidades de café esta próxima cosecha. El cuanta con la plantación existente  en buenas condiciones y quiere es mejorarla para que tenga una buena floración y así poder obtener rangos de cosechas más grandes. El pretende generar los ingresos necesarios para el bienestar de el y sus padres y seguir saliendo adelante con su proyecto cafetalero.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gredin is 33 years old, single and lives with his parents. With the loan, he hopes to purchase raw materials for his coffee crops and to hire workers. He hopes this will improve his coffee production for the upcoming harvest. His coffee crops are in good condition and he wants to improve them so they have better flowering and he can secure a larger harvest. Gredin hopes to earn the necessary income to ensure his well-being and that of his parents and so he can continue making headway as a coffee producer. This is his first loan with Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR is providing him with a loan with better credit facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for his coffee crops and to hire workers.

loans.name: Construyendo Un Futuro Mejor Group

texts.es: El señor YONO D. 43 años D. edad, es casado pero no tiene hijos , es  obrero D. profesión y con la ayuda D. su actual pareja aperturo un bazar en un mercado ya que en esos momentos no había una obra D. construcción  para que el trabaje. Los crédito otorgado por EDAPROSPO los invierte en la compra D. productos para surtir el bazar. En el futuro al Señor YONO le gustaría aperturar un negocio en otro lugar.
texts.en: Yono is a member of the "Building A Better Future" group. He is 43 years old and married but has no children. He is a laborer by profession and with the help of his wife he set up a general store in a market since at this time there are not construction jobs for him to work. With the group loan approved by Kiva partner EDAPROSPO, he plans to purchase products to stock his store. In the future, Yono would like to open a business in another location.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock a general store.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es: Cristian, tiene la edad de 21 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y sus hermanos. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos y la semilla del frijol para su posterior siembra. El cuenta con el área para la siembra y la experiencia necesaria para la buena explotación de este cultivo. El quiere establecer un cultivo bueno del cual pueda sacarle las ganancia para su bienestar y así poder invertir en lo mismo e ir realizando más grande su proyecto y fortalecido cada día más. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Cristian is 21 years old, single and lives with his parents and his siblings. With the loan, he hopes to purchase raw materials and bean seeds for his next planting session. He has an area of land to plant and the necessary experience to ensure a good harvest. He wants to establish a good crop so he can earn income for his own well-being and can reinvest in his land and continue making it bigger and better every day. This is the first loan he has received from Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan with better credit facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials and bean seeds for his next planting session.

loans.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con su esposo y 5 hijos D. los cuales dos trabajan y los demás estudian, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa y su esposo al cultivo D. maíz, el comercio lo tiene desD. hace 7 años, vendiendo casa por casa, además con su esposo cultivan el maíz.
Ella solicita un préstamo para adquirir los materiales agrícolas, ya que su esposo se dispone a sembrar la milpa, para esto  comprara abono, fertilizantes y semilla, este crédito le ayudara a tener los insumos necesarios para obtener una mejor cosecha, con la oportunidad D. comercializar una parte y contar con ingresos.
El sueño D. Rosa es sacar a sus hijos adelante, con sus estudios y tener la oportunidad D. verlos profesionalmente formados.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her husband and their 5 children: two who work and the others who are in school.  She sells clothes and her husband grows corn.  She has had her business for 7 years  selling house to house and also helping her husband with the corn.
Rosa is requesting a loan to purchase some agricultural products since her husband is ready to plant the crop.  For this she will buy manure, fertilizer and seeds.  The financing will help them purchase the necessary products for a better harvest, with more opportunity of selling a part of the crop and receiving money for it.
Rosa’s dream is to get her sons ahead with their schooling and to have the opportunity of seeing them become professionals.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizer and seeds to plant corn

loans.name: Timotea

texts.es:
Timotea, vive con su esposo y dos hijas, se dedica al comercio de ropa, medicina natural y cosméticos, esta venta la realiza de forma ambulante, recorre varios caseríos y cantones ofreciendo sus productos, esta actividad le ayuda a tener ingresos para solventar las necesidades del hogar.
Ella actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de blusas, faldas, ropa interior y cremas, lociones, maquillajes, con esta inversión podrá ofrecer a los clientes, variedad de productos para su demanda.
El objetivo de Ella es que el negocio sea rentable en el largo plazo y ayudar a su familia para superarse poco a poco de su actual condición.
texts.en:
Timotea lives with her husband and two daughters. She is an itinerant vendor of clothing, natural medicines, and cosmetics. She travels to different villages and hamlets offering her products. This work helps her have income to take care of the her household's needs.

She is requesting a loan to buy blouses, skirts, undergarments, creams, lotions, and makeup. With this investment, she will be able to offer her clients a variety of products to meet their demands. Timotea'a goal is for her business to be profitable in the long run and to help her family improve their situation little by little.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, undergarments, creams, lotions, and makeup

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras De La F Group

texts.es: L. Sra. Vicenta   es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos, actualmente es integrante en L. alcancía comunal “Las Emprendedoras D. L. F” grupo  conformado por 8   socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Vicenta  trabaja desD. hace  10 años  en su propia bodega  donD. venD. dulces, abarrotes etc.  elL. empezó vendiendo algunos productos, tiempo después pudo ampliar su negocio, Nos cuenta que nada fue fácil porque trabajo muy duro junto a su esposo , pero gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos cuentan  con educación y sobretodo tienen una mejor calidad D. vida , Vicenta nos cuenta que como mujer se siente muy orgullosa e independiente, El préstamo que se le otorgo fue para comprar mercadería, dulces, arroz azúcar leche y demás abarrotes . Sabemos que Vicenta  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Mrs. Vicenta has a common-law husband and four children.  She is in the communal bank "LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. L. F", which is comprised of eight members who are merchants in different activities.  For ten years Vicenta has been running her own store where she sells sweets, groceries, etc.  She started out selling only a few products, but later expanded her business.  She says it has not been easy for her and her husband who, through their joint effort and dedication, have been able to improve their income.  Their children are getting an education and have a better lifestyle.  Vicenta says she feels very proud to be an independent woman.  She will use the loan to buy goods such as sweets, rice, sugar, milk and other groceries.  We know that Vicenta will reach her goals with a lot of work and effort, and the Edaprospo loans will help in that regard.

loans.use: To buy goods (sweets and groceries).

loans.name: Jose Luciano

texts.en: Jose Luciano is 48 years old and lives in the San Lorenzo region of Honduras with his four dependent children. Jose Luciano has worked his whole life as a fisherman, and presentlly employs an assistant in his small business. He currently has $1,500 saved to invest in a small fishing boat that costs $2,000—and is thus requesting a loan of $500 to cover the remaining balance. His long term goal is to have several small fishing vessels with which he can expand his business and earn more income to support his family.

loans.use: To purchase a fishing boat.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene de 23 años, es soltero,  vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con solo servicio de luz  en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertnece al departamento de Piura. La zona se caracteriza por ser de mucha actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana.

Rene se dedica  a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) desde hace varios años, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas está en la parte posterior de su casa, los cría con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales  y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamaño ideal las ofrece en el mercado de Tambogrande y Piura.  Con eldinero que va adquirir por sus ovejas podrá atender sus necesidades personales.  Su padre le a dado en herencia unas tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón.

A solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1800 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados    asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales.  También lo utilizará para la compre de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y su producto.  Rene es una persona responsable y trabajadora con la única intensión de ayudar económica a sus padres en la casa como para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rene, 23, is single living in his parents’ house which only has electricity in Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department.  The area is known for having much farming, livestock raising and crafts making.

Rene has raised sheep for several years.  The corral holding his sheep is in his back yard.  He feeds them nutritionally balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach ideal size he sells them in the Tambogrande and Piura markets.  Money he gets from the sale of his sheep is used to cover his personal expenses.  His father has passed on some farmland to him where he grows lemons.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for an 1800 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed thus insuring good growth and development of his animals.  He will also use it to buy fertilizer to improve his farmland and thus his crop yields.  

Rene is a very responsible, hard working person whose only aim is helping his parents his parents economically at home to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and crop fertilizers.

loans.name: Jose Del Carmen

texts.es:
José de 49 años,  vive en su casa  propia con su esposa, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos, que pertenece al departamento de la Lambayeque.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura y   ganadería.

Desde hace algunos años José se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y maracuya, son productos que puede cosechar semanal y quincenalmente, el mismo que vende en los diferentes mercados de la zona, vendiendolo al por mayor y menor, con la finalidad de aumentar sus ingresos y poder solventar sus gastos de su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo  de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para brindar mantenimiento y comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus cosechas podrá pagar su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  José  es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo único que quiere es sacar adelante su negocio y tener más comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
José is 49 years old and lives together with his wife in his own home, in Olmos district, in Lambayeque department.  The people in this area farm and raise livestock.

José has been farming for some years.  He owns his own farm land where he sows lemons and passion fruit.  These are products that he can harvest weekly and fortnightly.  He sells them in the different markets in his area, both wholesale and retail, with the goal of increasing his income and covering his household expenses.

José has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can care for his crops and buy fertilizers in order to improve his land.  He will use the profits from the sale of his harvests to repay his loan and improve his quality of life.  José is a responsible and hard-working person and the only thing he wants is to get ahead in his business and enjoy more comforts at home.

loans.use: to care for his crops and buy fertilizers for his land

loans.name: Tatiana Anabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Rio Chico  del cantón Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como San Clemente, aquí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal San Clemente De Rio Chico, este lugar es conocido por su vegetación y porque la mayoría de su gente se dedica al agro.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Tatiana, tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de tres años. El marido es comerciante. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella ha podido ir aumentando más su negocio.

Es una joven ama de casa que divide su tiempo entre su hogar y su trabajo, ya que también se dedica a la venta de artículos tanto para el hogar como de uso personal, estos los hace a través del sistema de cartillas, el mismo que consiste en buscar cierta cantidad de clientes para luego cada semana realizar las entregas de los productos que pidieron y también realizar los cobros respectivos. También en su casa realiza trabajos de cortes de cabello, pintado de uñas entre otros trabajos de belleza, nos cuenta que lleva dos años que se dedica a esta actividad y que le va bastante bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar más artículos para el hogar como: planchas, ventiladores, colchones, licuadoras entre otras cosas.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que vive en casa del suegro.

En la foto nuestra socia está con su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
In the Rio Chico parish of the Portoviejo Canton, there is a place called San Clemente where the members of the communal bank "SAN CLEMENTE DE RIO CHICO" meet every two weeks.  This area is known for its lush vegetation and the fact that most people are involved in agriculture.

Here we meet Mrs. Tatiana, 20, who has a common-law husband and a three-year-old son.  Her husband is a merchant.  She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and has been able to expand her business with the loans she has received through the bank.

She is a young homemaker who divides her time between taking care of the home and working.  She sells household and personal care articles.
