texts.en: Florisa is 56 and is a very simple and hard-working woman.  She lives in Picoy in a home that she inherited from her parents with her beloved daughter, Marilyn, 22, and her father, 82. Florisa’s fields are among the best cared for of all of the farmers of the area.  She cares for them and works with a lot of patience and care.  She grows potatoes and peas, which she sells at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.  This is where she can obtain the best prices.  What she likes most about her job is sowing the land.  She has done this work for 31 years, and the most difficult part is fumigating the land.  With time, she hopes to buy more land and increase her production.  She also prepares hamburgers and kebabs on Sundays in the city of Tarma, where she makes good profits.  Since this hard-working woman doesn’t rest, in her free time she sews items maD. out of fabric, which she sells based on orders she receives from people in her town.  Now she plans to harvest large quantities, but the rise in seed prices worries her.  Nevertheless, she hopes to make good profits.  Florisa belongs to the communal bank, “Exaltación Santa Cruz,” and this is her 10th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, where she hopes for collaboration to finalize her plans.  On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments on time, like in previous loans she has had.  She is also thankful to her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very united.  Florisa will invest the requested money in the purchase of 2 bags of pea seed of the “letrilla” variety and in supplies like buckets of cooking oil to make the food that she sells.

loans.use: to buy two bags of pea seeds and cooking oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken in pieces and to buy certain products for her small grocery store

loans.name: Segunda Santos

texts.es:
Segunda tiene  52 años D. edad, ella es casada y  vive en casa propia la cual está ubicada en un  caserío llamado Somate Alto en el distritote  Sullana en el departamento D. Piura al norte D. Perú, este es un  caserío mediano con deseos D. superación.

Santos cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual es atendida por ella misma, hace varios años. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y clientes D. la zona diversos productos D. consumo diario, entre productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes, haci como también bebidas, el negación tiene buena cogida y en este tiempo a conseguido tener clientela fija.

Santos está  solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles  para poder invertir en su negocio, comprando más mercadería y D. esta manera incrementar sus inventarios.

Santos es una mujer bastante trabajadora y D. muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Segunda, 52, is married living in her own house located in a Hamlet called Somate Alto in Sullana District in Piura Department in northern Peru.  This is a medium sized hamlet wishing to improve.

Santos has a small home-based store that she’s tended herself for several years.  She offers her neighbors and customers in the area a variety of daily consumption products, among them basic need items and groceries, as well as beverages.  The store is well received and she has managed to establish a regular clientele.

Santos is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to invest in the store buying more merchandise to expand inventory.

Santos is quite a hard working woman of very good character.  People who know her hold her in high esteem and affection.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nancy  Cristina

texts.es: La Sra. Nancy es una  muy trabajadora que  desde hace  mas  de   ocho  años  se  dedica  a la compra  y  venta  de  ropa   usada , accesorios y  zapatos, actualmente   ella renta un local  donde tiene gran variedad de  productos para la venta,  en  esta  ocasión    ella utilizara el crédito  para acondicionar su establecimiento para  que  así su clientela  se sienta  mas  agusto cuando  acuden a  su  local, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado  para  la realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en: Señora Nancy is very hard-working, and she has had a business buying and selling used clothing, accessories, and shoes, for more than 8 years.  She rents in a location that has a large variety of products for sale.  She will use this loan to fix up her location so her customers feel more at home when they arrive there.  She is thankful for the support that is being offered her so she can carry out this project.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Teodolinda

texts.es: Teodolinda, de 38 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Ronald de 44 años y su hija Zulema de 18 años, en el caserío de Picoy. Desde muy joven comenzó a trabajar para salir adelante. Su principal negocio es la venta de animales menores en su misma casa, es ahí donde vende gallinas, patos y otros animales, los cuales están bien alimentados y cuidados, es por eso que tiene muchos clientes y sus ingresos económicos son buenos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es alimentar a sus aves, ya que los cría con mucho cariño, lleva 18 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que sacrificar algunos de sus animales, para vender su carne a las carnicerías de su localidad. Para el futuro, planea alquilar una tienda donde pueda brindar a sus clientes una mejor comodidad a la hora de atenderlos. Pero hace poco incursionó en la venta de productos comestibles y de primera necesidad y aunque le falte abastecerlo con más productos, le está dejando buenas ganancias. Además cuenta que comenzó a trabajar junto a su hija en la confección de buzos, donde piensa más adelante invertir la mayor parte de su capital ya que tiene mayor campo de trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Exaltación Santa Cruz”, y este es el décimo crédito con MFP; donde espera un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Teodolinda, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos comestibles como: azúcar, arroz, leche, atún y demás. Asimismo comprará tela para la confección de buzos.
texts.en:
Teodolina is 38 and is a very simple and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home in the town of Picoy with her husband Ronald, who is 44, and her daughter Sulema, who is 18.  Since she was very young, she started working to get ahead.  Her main business is selling small animals at her home.  She sells chickens, ducks, and other animals who are well-fed and cared for.  This is why she has many customers and her economic income is good.  What she likes most about her job is feeding her birds, and she raises them with a lot of care.  She has had this business for 18 years, and what she considers the most difficult is sacrificing some of her animals to sell the meat in butcher shops in her area. 

In the future, she plans to rent a store where she can offer her customers more comfort.  A little while ago, she invested in consumable goods and basic products, and she needs more money to increase her inventory.  She is making good profit.  She also tells us that she started working with her daughter to make sweaters where she plans to invest the majority of her capital .  She belongs to the communal bank, “Exaltación Santa Cruz,” and this is her 10th credit with Microfinanzas Prisma.  She hopes this small loan will help her meet her objectives.  On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments on time, just like she has with her previous loans.  She is also thankful to her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and united.  Teodolinda will invest the requested money in the purchase of consumable goods like:  sugar, rice, milk, tuna, etc.  She also will buy fabric to make sweaters.

loans.use: to buy basic food products to supply her store and also to buy fabric.

loans.name: Vilu Maribeth

texts.es: Vilu Maribeth tiene 33 años, esta mujer ha sido una gran madre para sus hijos ya que siempre ha brindado lo necesario además todos los días les enseña valores importantes para que sean personas de bien. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, desde hace mas de 10 años que tiene este negocio, sus inicios fueron cuando tenía la edad de 18 años, a pesar de ser tan joven tenía la experiencia necesaria para ofrecerles a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan. El crédito es para la compra de ropa, calzado, cosméticos, sabanas y tratamientos.
texts.en: Vilu Maribeth is 33 years of age. This woman has been a great mother to her children since she has always provided them with what they need, and in addition, every day she teaches them important values so that they may grow up to be decent people. She earns a living selling general merchandise. She began this business more than ten years ago when she was 18 years old, yet in spite of being so young, she had the necessary experience to offer her customers what they wanted. The loan is to purchase clothing, footwear, cosmetics, sheets and window treatments.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, footwear, cosmetics, sheets and window treatments.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa es una madre de familia de 34 años, vive con su esposo e hija en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

Teresa se dedica  a la crianza de ganado vacuno y caprino desde hace unos años, su corral donde se encuentran sus animales están en la parte posterior de su casa, los cría con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales  y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamaño óptimo los ofrece en el mercado de Lambayeque y Chiclayo,  con el dinero que va adquirir por la venta de sus animales, podrá atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles mediante Capital Semilla para  comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento para sus animales  asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de los mismos para seguir comercializandolo a sus clientes.  Teresa es conocida en la zona por ser una mujer trabajadora, que con mucho empeño desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, en especial la de su hija.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 34-year-old mother living with her husband and daughter in her own house located in Mórrope District belonging to Lambayeque Department.  The zone is dedicated to agriculture, raising livestock, crafts and tourism.

Teresa has been raising cattle and goats for several years now.  The corral her animals are located in is in her back yard.  She feeds them balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach optimal size and weight she sells them at the Lambayeque and Chiclayo markets.  Income from the animal sales will be used to meet daily household needs.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan through its Capital Seed program to buy more animals and their respective feed assuring their good growth and development to continue selling to her customers.  Teresa is known in the zone for being a hard working woman who very much wants to improve her family’s quality of life through her work, especially her daughter’s.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Josefa Danelia

texts.es: Josefa Danelia tiene 46 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de comedor. Tiene más de 15 años en su negocio, con mucho empeño y dedicación ha brindado a su familia todos los días el alimento diario. Uno de sus mayores desafíos en su negocio es atender bien a sus clientes pues siempre tiene que estar al pendiente de la buena comida y también de satisfacer a sus clientes. el motivo del crédito es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, repollo, verduras y  frutas para la elaboración de sus refrescos.
texts.en:
Josefa Danelia is 46 years of age and her business is catering. She has been in this business for over 15 years. With much effort and dedication she has offered her family every day their daily sustenance. One of her major challenges in her business is providing good customer service, as she must always be attentive to the good food she is serving and also satisfy her customers. 

The purpose of the loan is to purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, cabbage, vegetables and fruits used in the making of her refreshments.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, oils, cabbage, vegetables and fruits for making her refreshments.

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Este cliente  tiene su domicilio  en  ciudad de Managua capital, la  señora Angela del Carmen se ha caracterizado por ser una persona honrada  trabajadora con buenos principios  morales como persona, debido a que ha sabido  ganarse el aprecio de todos sus  compañeros de trabajo. 
Se presento ante esta oficina  de  Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para ser invertido en mejoramiento de su vivienda como es la compra de materiales de construcción,  bloques piedra cantera, cemento  arena piedrín hierro  y  pago de  mano obra, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, que es por la quien trabaja y se esfuerza diariamente.
texts.en:
This client makes her home in the capital city of Managua. Mrs. Angela del Carmen has been characterized as an honorable, hardworking person with good moral principles as a person, because of which she has known how to earn the esteem of all her workmates. 

She came to this Ceprodel office in order to seek a loan to invest in improvements to her housing, that is, to buy construction materials: quarry stone, cement, sand, gravel, iron, and labor costs, in order to provide a better quality of life to her family, for whom she works hard every day.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad es una madre de familia de 45 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, contando con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural de la provincia de Morropón que al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Natividad es ha la venta de productos de primera necesidad (arroz, leche, aceite, azúcar, etc), en su propio domicilio desde hace unos 3 años, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse de otros negocios y así pueda obtener más ingresos para su hogar.

El crédito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad de productos y poder implementar su negocio con cosas nuevas, una vez que sus ventas aumenten podrá pagar su préstamo y solventar sus obligaciones familiares.  El sueño de Natividad es tener más adelante una tienda más grande que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y lo logrará con su trabajo y empeño.
texts.en:
Natividad is a 45 year-old mother who lives with her husband and two children in their own home.  The only utility their home receives is electricity.  It is located in the rural area of Morropón province, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock, make handicrafts and work in the tourist industry.

Natividad's business is selling basic household products (rice, milk, oil, sugar, etc.) from her own home.  She has been in this business for three years and, as her business is located in her home, she is able to serve her customers at any time which allows her to differentiate her business from the rest and also allows her to make more income for her household.

Natividad is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she will use to buy a larger quantity of products and stock her business with new items.  Once her sales increase, she will be able to repay her loan and cover her family obligations.  Natividad's dream for the future is to own a larger store which will make her more income and allow her to improve her family's quality of life.  She will achieve this by working hard.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products to stock her business

loans.name: Inocencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC II”; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba,  departamento del Cusco.

La  socia Inocencia tiene 29 años de edad y La socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos  de 12, 3 años de edad;  la socia trabaja en su panadería, ella junto a su conyugue tienen una panadería y ambos trabajan mano a  mano, la socia apoya con la compra de harina, manteca, leña; la socia también tiene un negocio alterno a este ella vende productos de salud estos productos son de omnilife y ella los distribuye según el pedido que obtenga. La socia desea el crédito para poder invertir en la compra de leña, harina, manteca para la a panadería y otra parte de esta es para comprar productos de salud para tener listo y vender.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Torrechayoc II" [Lord of Torrechayoc II] and lives in the Urubamba district in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. 

Inocencia, 29, lives in a committed relationship and has two children who are 12 and 13 years of age. The member works in the bakery which she has with her spouse and where they both work side by side. The member provides support in the form of flour, lard and firewood purchases. The member has an additional business in which she sells health products from Omnilife. She distributes the products according to the orders she receives. The member wishes to have the loan to be able to invest in the purchase of firewood, flour and lard for the bakery, and another portion is for purchasing health products so she may have them on hand and ready for sale. 

The member infinitely values and appreciates the loan that was granted since this allows her to grow with her business and improve her quality of life. Thus she commits herself to making her payments within the stipulated time period.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of firewood, flour and health products.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 45 años de edad, el es casado y tiene 02 hijos menores de edad con los cuales vive en un caserío llamado Los Peches a 10 minutos del distrito de Mochumi, Héctor cuenta con casa propia la cual cuenta con los servicios  básicos  

Héctor se dedica a la  comercialización de ganado vacuno, caprino y  ovino, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte exterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en desde sus domicilio en ocasiones distribuye sus animales en caseríos cercanos al distrito de Mochumi.  Esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 9 años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.

Héctor está solicitando un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles para el engorde de su ganado vacuno, con el préstamo comprara alimento para dicho ganado, medicina y adecuará corrales para tal fin.

Héctor es una  persona emprendedora y responsable, el desea poder crecer como empresario y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Héctor is 45 years old, married, and has two dependent children.  He lives with his family in a small village called Los Peches, which is located 10 minutes from Mochumi district.  Héctor owns his own home which is connected to basic services.

Héctor sells cattle, goats and sheep which he raises in pens that are located outside his home.  He runs his business from home and sometimes sells his animals in nearby villages in Mochumi district.  Héctor has been in this business for nine years.  He has gained experience in this field and also regular customers.

Héctor is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles to fatten his cattle.  He will use his loan to buy feed and medicine for his cattle.  He will also carry out some work on their pens.

Héctor is an entrepreneurial and responsible person who would like to be able to grow as a businessman and provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo es un padre de familia de 45 años, vive con su esposo  y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con  los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Piura. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura,ganadería y turismo.

Lorenzo se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco y de soya desde hace algunos años, ésta actividad lo desarrolla en su vivienda, donde a colocado una mesa para exibir su producto para venderlo a sus clientes, con las ganancias que obtenga podra atender las necesidades diarias de su familia.

El préstamo solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más pescado fresco para su venta e insumos y utensilios para elaborar la soya para venderlo a los pobladores de la zona, al incrmentarse sus ventas de ambos productos que ofrece podrá cubrir su crédito y seguir ayudando a su familia para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Lorenzo es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable, un padre que desea tener un negocio más grande para darles un buen futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is 45 years old and lives with his wife and two children in their own home, which does not have basic utilities, located in a rural area in the department of Piura.  This area is dedicated to farming, raising livestock, and tourism.  

Lorenzo has worked selling fresh fish and soy for a few years.  He does this work from his home, where he has a table to exhibit his products to sell them to his customers.  With the income he earns, he can meet the needs of his family.

He has asked for this loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase more fresh fish, as well as supplies and utensils to make soy to sell it to the people in his area.  When he increases his sales of both products that he offers, he will cover his loan and continue helping his family to give them a better quality of life.  Lorenzo is a hard-working, responsible person, and a father who wants to have a larger business to give his children a good future.

loans.use: to purchase more fresh fish and supplies and utensils to prepare soy.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 42 años, es una madre de familia muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Picoy. Junto a su esposo Marcos de 36 años y su única hija Yulisa de 13 años, quienes son el motivo principal de todos sus esfuerzos. Con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio Carmen ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva papa y arveja, productos que luego lleva a vender a la ciudad de Tarma, donde las vende al por mayor. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia, es por eso que desea poner todas sus ganas en sacar adelante este negocio. Para ello también dedica su tiempo libres a trabajar en terrenos aledaños, donde le pagan S/. 15 nuevos soles diarios por quitar la maleza que crece de entre sus cultivos. Así está segura que podrá juntar más dinero con lo que pueda adquirir varios terrenos de cultivo junto al río, teniendo al alcance el regadillo que necesitan su siembra para desarrollar. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta el mercado mayorista de Tarma, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. En adelante, espera mejorar sus cultivos y poder así tener mejores ingresos. Ahora comenzará a producir flores en sus 2 hectáreas de terrenos para el mes de noviembre donde la demanda de flores crece por motivo de las festividades nacionales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Exaltación Santa Cruz”, donde es el noveno crédito con MFP y está contenta de saber que tendrá el apoyo financiero para sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Carmen, comprará con el dinero solicitado semilla de flor de gladiolo, además de varios sacos de abono orgánico y fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con mucho éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Carmen, 42 years old, is a humble, hardworking mother. She lives in her own home in the village of Picoy with her husband Marcos, 36, and their only daughter, Yulisa, who is 13 years old. Marcos and Yuliza are the inspiration for all her hard work. Through great effort and sacrifice, Carmen has been able to work her lands and make them very fertile. She grows potatoes and peas, which she then carries to the city of Tarma to sell at wholesale. Her harvests have provided enough income to support her family, which is why she wants to put everything she has into growing her business. She also works weeding the crops in neighboring fields in her spare time, for which she earns 15 soles a day. She is confident that she'll be able to earn enough money to acquire fields along the river, which will be easy to irrigate and improve her harvest. What she likes most about her job is taking care of her crops. She's been farming for four years and thinks the hardest part is taking her product to the wholesale market in Tarma, since the sacks are very heavy and tire her out. In the future, she hopes to improve her crops and earn more income. She plans to start growing flowers on her land in anticipation of November, when demand for flowers goes up because of the national holidays. She is a member of the Exaltación Santa Cruz village bank, and this is her ninth loan with MFP. She is happy to know that she will have financial support in meeting her goals. She is committed once again to making her payments on time, as she did for previous loans. She is also happy to be part of a village bank because all the other members are very responsible, supportive people. Carmen will use the requested loan to buy gladiolus seeds, as well as several bags of organic fertilizers to make her next plantings very successful.

loans.use: purchase flower seeds such as gladiolus as well as bags of organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Purificación

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC II”; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba,  departamento del Cusco.

La  socia Maria tiene 47 años de edad y La socia es casada y tiene 6 hijos  la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la atención de su propio negocio la socia tiene un kiosco escolar en un colegio y vende todo tipo de abarrotes escolares, la socia vende galletas, caramelos, sándwich, empanadas de carne y queso, pan con huevo y gaseosas, también vende refrescos y papas fritas, la socia diversifica su kiosco para poder abastecer a sus clientes; la socia requiere el préstamo e n esta ocasión para poder invertir en la compra de mercadería escolar y embutidos, carnes para elaborar los sándwiches. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para su negocio escolar.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Maria belongs to the village bank SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC II. She lives in Urubamba, a town in the Urubamba province of the department of Cusco.
Maria is 47 years old and married with six children. In addition to taking care of the home, she also has her own business. She runs a little shop in a local school, where she sells all sorts of treats like cookies, candies, sandwiches, meat and cheese empanadas, egg sandwiches, soft drinks, and potato chips. Maria has a wide variety of products to satisfy her customers, and is requesting this loan to purchase school supplies and cold cuts for sandwiches for her business.
Maria is infinitely grateful for the loan she's been offered, since it will help her expand her business and improve her quality of life. She is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase products for her little school shop.

loans.name: Diana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Diana de 22 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres en su casa propia, contando con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, artesanía y turismo.

La actividad a la que se dedica Diana es ha la venta de golosinas,gaseosas y bodoques (preparación de refrescos, que se coloca después en una bolsa y se lleva a que se congele), al tener su negocio en su propio domicilio podrá atender a sus clientes a cualquier hora y así pueda obtener más ingresos para sus gastos personales.

El crédito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 500 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad de insumos para preparar sus bodoques, más golosinas y gaseosas para poder implementar su negocio, una vez que sus ventas aumenten podrá pagar su préstamo y seguir ayudando a sus padres con los gastos de su casa.  El sueño de Diana es tener más adelante una tienda más grande y surtida que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y la de sus padres.
texts.en:
Diana is 22 years old, single, and lives with her parents in their own home.  The only utility they have in their home is electricity.  The house is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock, make handicrafts and work in the tourist industry.

Diana sells candies, soda and 'bodoques' (soft drinks which are prepared and then placed in a bag and frozen).  Her business is located in her home which means that she can serve her customers at any hour and thereby make more income with which to cover her personal expenses.

Diana has requested a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she will use to buy a larger quantity of supplies for preparing her 'bodoques'.  She will also buy more candies and soda with which to stock her business.  Once her sales increase, she will be able to repay her loan and continue helping her parents with their household expenses.  Diana's dream for the future is to own a larger and better-stocked store which will make her more income so that she can improve her own quality of life as well as that of her parents.

loans.use: to buy more candies and supplies for making 'bodoques'

loans.name: Juana Flor

texts.es:
Juana de 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla Juana es a la venta de productos de primera necesidad (arroz, leche, aceite, azúcar, verduras, etc), en su propio domicilio a colocado su negocio desde hace algunos años, al tener su tienda en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora y así pueda obtener más ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades familiares .

El crédito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles, lo utilizara para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos, una vez que sus ventas aumenten cubchofer de  su mototaxirirá su crédito y mejorará su nivel de vida.  Juana con mucho empeño y trabajado desea tener un tienda más surtida y más adelante poder tener comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Juana is 40 years old and lives with her husband in her own home.  Her house does not have basic services and is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Juana's business is selling essential household products (rice, milk, oil, sugar, vegetables, etc.).  She sells these products from her home where she set up her business some years ago.  As her store is located in her home, she is able to serve her customers at any time which means she can make more income with which to cover her family's needs.

Juana has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use this money to buy a larger quantity of merchandise.  She will expand her business with other products once her sales increase.  Through a lot of effort and hard work, Juana would like to have a better stocked store and, in the future, she would like to be able to have more comforts in her home.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise to expand her business

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
Mónica es una madre de familia de 31 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al de Piura.  Esta zons tiene como actividad  principal la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía .

Mónica se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora (es una bebida rica elaborada a base de maíz y  muy consumida en el norte del Perú), esta actividad lo realiza desde hace varios años, ya que es una costumbre que ha pasado de generación en generación.  También cría aves de corral  (gallinas y pavos), su corral donde viven sus animales se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con maíz molido, polvillo de arroz y comida balanceada.  Posteriormente vende sus aves una vez que hayan llegado a su desarrollo óptimo para poder venderlo en los diferentes mercados de la zona para poder incrementar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia.

El crédito que ha solicitado es de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme  Alternativa, será destinado  para la compra de  insumos para la preparación de la chicha de jora y alimentos balanceados, con la finalidad de que sus aves engorden y pueda venderlo a buen precio para poder pagar su préstamo y al mismo tiempo esos ingresos le ayuden a que su familia tenga un mejor futuro.  Mónica es una mujer que siempre está dispuesta a salir adelante para mejorar en la vida junto y darle un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mónica is a 31 year-old mother who lives with her husband and children in her own home.  The only utility she receives in her home is electricity.  Her home is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Mónica makes and sells 'chicha de jora' (a delicious corn-based drink which is very popular in the north of Peru).  She has been in this business for several years and it is a custom that has been handed down from generation to generation.  She also raises poultry (hens and turkeys).  The pen where she keeps her animals is located outside her home.  She feeds her birds ground corn, rice powder and balanced animal feed.  Once her birds have reached an optimum level of development, she sells them in the different markets in her area in order to increase her income and get her family ahead in life.

Mónica has requested a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use this money to buy supplies for making 'chicha de jora'.  She will also buy balanced feed with which to fatten her birds.  She will then sell the birds for a good price so that she can repay her loan.  This income will also help her family to enjoy a better future.  Mónica is a woman who is always ready to get ahead in order to improve her family's life and provide her children with a better future.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making 'chicha de jora' and to buy balanced feed for her animals
